statements: DELETE FROM AirPollutionData WHERE location_id = 1 AND pollution_level > 50.0;
DELETE FROM AirPollutionData WHERE pollution_level <= 25.0 AND location_name = 'City Central';
DELETE FROM areas WHERE area_id = 1 AND pollution_level > 5;
DELETE FROM measurements WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND pollution_reading > 50.5;
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' AND area_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
DELETE FROM pollution_data WHERE area_id = 3 AND pollution_reading < 5.0;
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE area_id = 10 AND sensor_type = 'temperature';
DELETE FROM pollution_level WHERE area_id = 5 AND level < 3;
